com.arm.mbed.cloud.sdk.deviceupdate.model

Class AbstractUpdateCampaign

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.arm.mbed.cloud.sdk.deviceupdate.model.AbstractUpdateCampaign
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SdkModel, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    UpdateCampaign

    @Preamble(description="Model for an update campaign.")
public abstract class AbstractUpdateCampaign
extends java.lang.Object
implements SdkModel
    Model for an update campaign.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
